LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Admin.Settings.CustomHeadStyles.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Insert your custom css styles that will be added in the head after all other css files. This way you can further customize the theme. Example: .footer { display: none; }

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Admin.Settings.EnabledAsWidget
LocaleResource.Value: Enable the theme plugin as widget

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Admin.Settings.EnabledAsWidget.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If you check this opton you will enable the widget of the theme plugin.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Admin.Settings.PinterestUrl.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Insert your follow us URL address on pinterest. If left empty the icon in the footer will not be displayed.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Admin.Settings.RemoveCopyright.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Remove Copyright notice after a copyright removal key had been purchased by www.nopCommerce.com

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Admin.Settings.VimeoUrl.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Insert your follow us URL address on vimeo. If left empty the icon in the footer will not be displayed.
